Package datas

Class LecteurCd

java.lang.Object
datas.LecteurCd
public class LecteurCd extends Object
The LecteurCd class simulates in a simplified way the functionalities of a CD player :
  • Loading a CD
  • PLAY
  • STOP
  • NEXT
  • PREVIOUS
Author:
Aurelia Segarra

    • estCharge

      private boolean estCharge
      Is there any CD in the player ?

    • indexPlage

      private int indexPlage
      Index of the current track (1 inf or equals INDEX inf or equals to nbrPlages or zero)

    • leCDCourant

      private datas.Cd leCDCourant
      Current CD (in the player)

  • Constructor Details

    • LecteurCd

      public LecteurCd()
      Constructor for a CD player. No CD at the end of the construction (leCDCourant=null). Loading a CD needs the "chargerUnCD()" method.

  • Method Details

    • getTempsTotal

      public String getTempsTotal()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      Total duration of a CD

    • getNbrPlages

      public int getNbrPlages()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      number of the tracks (-1 if no CD loaded)

    • getIndexCourant

      public int getIndexCourant()
      GETTER 1 inf or equals INDEX inf or equals to nbrPlages
      Returns:
      index of the current track (0 if no CD loaded)

    • getPlageCourante

      public datas.Plagecd getPlageCourante()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      the current track (null if no CD loaded)

    • estCharge

      public boolean estCharge()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      true if a CD is loaded

    • getCD

      public datas.Cd getCD()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      the current CD or null if there is no CD

    • setDecharger

      public void setDecharger()
      SETTER The boolean "estCharge" turn to false and "leCDCourant" turn to null

    • chargerUnCD

      public void chargerUnCD()
      METHOD The method should create a CD and turn the boolean "estCharge" to true

    • chargerUnCD

      public void chargerUnCD(String leFich)
      METHOD Should load a CD into the player. the CD is created from a text file
      Parameters:
      leFich - - Name of the file to read

    • stop

      public void stop()
      METHOD Simulate the STOP button (turn the index of the track to 1) Nothing happens if no CD loaded

    • play

      public void play()
      METHOD Simulate the PLAY button (turn the index of the track to 1) Nothing happens if no CD loaded

    • next

      public void next()
      METHOD Simulate the NEXT button (increment the index of the track) Nothing happens if no CD loaded

    • previous

      public void previous()
      METHOD Simulate the PREVIOUS button (decrease the index of the track) Nothing happens if no CD loaded
